page.title: 05 TREES IN COTTON
page.content: BOTTOM COMMON has Birch,English Oak and Scots pine which are used for firewood, furniture and boat building. RAMSHORE COMMON has Scots pine, Korean pine and Lodge Pole pine which will grow for eighty years before being used in house building and pallets. PEGGYS WOOD has Birch and Scots Pine. The Birch can be used for firewood or turnery. STARWOOD has many hardwoods which include Sycamore,Beech,Oak and Ash.Some cangrow for nearly 100 years before being used. HEATHY GORE has some fir trees in it as well as many hard woods. CARR WOOD is mainily fir trees but has some hardwoods. KEYWOOD has numerous conifers.Most of the timber produced is used for pallets,furniture,and house timbers.
